attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All governments have called general elections at times to ensure their best chances of getting re-elected. We should move to fixed terms of government of 4 or 5 years with fixed polling dates so that a government cannot manipulate the electorate in this way. Even if the Prime Minister resigns for whatever reason, the party must see out its fixed term.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Fixed-term-govt/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
